survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of professional development courses offered by your organization to help improve future training initiatives.

questions.question_text: Which professional development course(s) have you completed in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which professional development course(s) have you completed in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the professional development courses you attended?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one course in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the professional development courses you attended?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one course in Q1

questions.question_text: How relevant were the course materials to your current job role?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one course in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure relevance.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How relevant were the course materials to your current job role?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one course in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future professional development courses?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future professional development courses?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend these professional development courses to your colleagues?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one course in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: Would you recommend these professional development courses to your colleagues?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one course in Q1
